markdownRemark.html:
I just installed sabrosus, and it works really well. Just as advertised. It's an open-source version of del.icio.us, so you can keep and manipulate your links on your own, without having to depend on another service provider. Now THAT'S my type of setup.

What's extra cool - is it also includes an import function to get your links directly from del.icio.us.

Sabrosus
